ai.seitok.flow.gunvarrel

Class Gunvarrel

  • java.lang.Object
    • academy.hekiyou.flow.gunvarrel.Gunvarrel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, Loader

    public class Gunvarrel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loader, Executor
    Gunvarrel is a semi-automatic command loading and management system. Full automation may be possible, however, it would significantly increase start-up time.

      • findAndExecute

        public boolean findAndExecute(java.lang.String commandName,
                              Invoker invoker,
                              Channel chan,
                              Flow flow)
        Description copied from interface: Executor
        Finds the appropriate command (if any) and executes the it with the given Invoker and flow.
        Specified by:
        findAndExecute in interface Executor
        Parameters:
        commandName - The command to invoke
        invoker - The invoker for the command
        chan - The channel the command was from
        flow - The flow of arguments
        Returns:
        true if the command was found and (was attempted to be) executed, false otherwise
